kanti umengameli u [cyril] ramaphosa ujoyine abanye abarhola abane besiphande se saco ebotswana uk' khulumisana ngeendlela zokurhabisa ukukhanjiswa kwepahla
kutjho ze awa letjhumi nambili kukwekwezi f_m
ilunga lepalamende lezimbabwe [fortine charumbira] ulindeleke ukugandelela iinarha ze afrika

kanti ilunga lepalamende i PAN [african parliament] u [julius] malema oyingcenye yekomidii yesiphande sesewula afrika uthi umengameli omutjha wepalamende le kufuze adzimelele ekuqiniseni izikweli

ngonobangela wesithathu angisale ngizibamba la zangaleli awa iindaba seengzabuya nezinye ngesimbi yesibili okwanje angithathe iintambo ngizibuyisele e [studio] sethu samahlelo oko sizibuyisele kunompumela nesiqhema sakhe

ukuthulela iindaba zesimbi yokthoma lotjhani stjhaba sekhethu indaba ekhamba phambili ngaleli awa indaba ethi umengameli u [cyril] ramaphosa uthi umkhakha wezokumayina wenarha yekhethwapha uyisika yomnotho wenarha le
